name: Zurry The Ritual Bat
description:
DISCLAIMER

Zurry is currently in early access. Despite this term often meaning "incomplete game", we want to clarify that this first version is complete relatively to our original idea for the game. Zurry is simply not done. Our goal is to expand on it and polish it, listening to the players feedback, as well as adding new locations and mechanics to make the experience deeper.

Zurry was sent by the Master Wizard to gather the ingredients for the great Halloween Ritual. Hurry up and collect all the necessary flying across different levels, each one with a different setting.

Zurry The Ritual Bat is an arcade game in which you play as Zurry, a bat sent out to gather ingredients scattered around worlds.

FEATURES

  • Fly with Zurry through three different locations and six levels and collect every single ingredient for the Ritual that you can find.
  • Challenge yourself and the community: try to complete the levels as fast as you can!
  • Tons of collectibles hidden around every world. Find them all to 100% complete each level!
  • Full controller support
